attributes.action: No to vaccination passports in the United Kingdom!
attributes.additional_details: Needing to prove who has decided to be vaccinated will stereotype and cause division amongst the public! Coerced intervention such as making a law to “not allow” the public into a theatre, pub, restaurants and shops is discrimination against “faith groups” people who can’t have a jab for health reasons and the ones that have an individual free right to choose not to have one!
attributes.background: The government needs to understand that we live in a country with the “right to choose” what we do with our bodies. Our body our choice!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
